nodes.text: Star Wars Weekly 106: Trapped Between Gun and Claw! is the one hundred sixth issue in the Marvel UK Star Wars series of comics.

This issue includes My Enemies Surround Me!, the third black & white part of the story The Weapons Master!, which was reprinted in color in Marvel Illustrated Books' Star Wars. It wasn't until the arrival of the Star Wars Omnibus series from Dark Horse Comics that the comic shows its original non-color style.
The comic also includes the sixth and last part of a brand-new section called Star Profile featuring Peter Cushing alongside a study-interview of his carrer until 1979.
